definition: to sauté/to stir-fry/to speculate/to hype/to fire (sb)
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Dad was very good at making fried noodles, and a lot of people liked his noodles.
sentences.chinese: 老爸很擅长做炒面，当时很多人都很喜欢他做的面。

sentences.english: My favorite meal is pork fried noodles.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的餐点是猪肉炒面。

sentences.english: The fried noodles is ready. Would mind serving now?
sentences.chinese: 炒面已经做好了，现在上菜好吗？

sentences.english: Add in the sauce for fried tagliatelle , continue to stir the tagliatelle and pork meat.
sentences.chinese: 加入炒面调味料，反复的搅拌面条及猪肉丝。

sentences.english: Chowmein technology in exchange for butter chicken technology??
sentences.chinese: 炒面技术换取奶油鸡技术？

sentences.english: This simple noodle stir fry was devine, made by a one-dish master.
sentences.chinese: 这个简单的炒面是神级的，一个大厨烧出来的。

sentences.english: The technics of producing sauce for shallot meat silk fried noodle was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了香葱肉丝快炒面调料包的制作工艺及食用方法。

sentences.english: I had Wonton Soup, Pork Fried Rice, and Chicken Chow Mein.
sentences.chinese: 我点了馄饨，猪肉炒米粉，鸡肉炒面。

sentences.english: Mee goreng is a dish famous in Indonesia, Malaysia, and Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 印度炒面是印尼，马来西亚和新加坡的一道名菜。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, chow mein is a dish of stir-fried noodles.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，炒面是一道用面炒成的菜。

definition: noodles served with soy sauce/sesame butter etc
jianbing, a savory Chinese crêpe/pancake/CL:張|张[zhang1]
